title: Ghosts: The People That Melt in The Rain #2
description: Laura has only just come to terms with moving to the strange town of Deluge, when she is mysteriously transported into a painting that is displayed in the school library. Shocked by her sudden relocation, she realizes she’s been brought back home to Seattle, Washington, but it isn’t the Seattle she left behind. Has she also stepped backwards in time?
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
